general.a1: Submission starts on July 1 and runs until August 15 each year. Documents can be submitted in person at the admissions office or online via our website.
general.q2: What programs does the university offer?
general.a2: Salymbekov University offers programs in General Medicine, Dentistry, Pharmacy and Nursing. All programs are accredited by the Ministry of Education and Science of the Kyrgyz Republic.
general.q3: How long is the study period?
general.a3: Duration depends on the program: General Medicine - 6 years, Dentistry and Pharmacy - 5 years, Nursing - 4 years.
general.q4: What languages are instruction offered in?
general.a4: Instruction is provided in Russian and Kyrgyz. Students may choose the preferred language at admission.
general.q5: Are there internships in foreign clinics?
general.a5: Yes, the university cooperates with leading medical centers in Germany, Turkey and other countries. Top students may do internships abroad.
general.q6: Is the diploma recognized outside Kyrgyzstan?
general.a6: The Salymbekov University diploma is recognized in CIS countries. Additional certification may be required to work in other countries according to local laws.

general.admissionStart: Document submission at Salymbekov University starts on July 1 and continues until August 15 each year. Documents can be submitted in person or online via our website.
general.programs: Salymbekov University offers programs in General Medicine, Dentistry, Pharmacy and Nursing. All programs are accredited by the Ministry of Education and Science of the Kyrgyz Republic.
general.duration: Program duration varies: General Medicine - 6 years, Dentistry and Pharmacy - 5 years, Nursing - 4 years.
general.languages: Instruction is provided in Russian and Kyrgyz. Students can select their preferred language at admission.
general.internship: Yes, the university cooperates with leading medical centers in Germany, Turkey and other countries. Top students may undertake internships abroad.
general.diplomaRecognition: The Salymbekov University diploma is recognized in CIS countries. For other countries, additional certification may be required according to local regulation.

documents.required: Required documents: high school diploma, passport, medical certificate form 086-U, ORT certificate, 3x4 photos (6 pcs), family composition certificate, income certificate (for benefits).
documents.nostrification: Yes, education documents obtained outside the Kyrgyz Republic must be nostrified by relevant state authorities.
documents.medicalValidity: Medical certificate form 086-U is valid for 6 months from the date of issue. It must include all necessary medical examinations.
documents.onlineSubmission: Yes, you can apply online via our website. After approval, original documents must be submitted within 3 days.
documents.translation: Documents in Russian do not require translation. Documents in other languages must be translated into Kyrgyz or Russian and notarized.
documents.lostDocuments: If documents are lost, they must be restored through the relevant authorities. To restore a diploma contact your school, to restore a passport contact the Ministry of Internal Affairs. The procedure may take up to 30 days.

exams.subjects: For medical specialties (General Medicine, Dentistry): biology and chemistry. For Pharmacy: chemistry and biology. For Nursing: biology only. ORT certificate is also required.
exams.dates: Entrance exams are held from August 20 to August 25. Exact schedule is published by August 15 on the university website and admissions office.
exams.minimumScore: Minimum ORT scores: General Medicine - 120, Dentistry - 110, Pharmacy - 100, Nursing - 90. For profile subjects a minimum of 60% correct answers is required.
exams.retake: Retake of entrance exams is possible only in the next academic year. Only one attempt is allowed this year.
exams.preparation: The university holds preparatory courses in May-July. We also recommend textbooks for grades 10-11 and past ORT tests.
exams.format: Exams are in test format. Each test contains 40 questions, time limit - 90 minutes. Answer sheets are used for computerized processing.
exams.benefits: Benefits are granted to orphans, persons with disabilities I-II groups and war veterans. Winners of national olympiads are admitted without exams.

payment.cost: Tuition fees: General Medicine - 180,000 som/year, Dentistry - 200,000 som/year, Pharmacy - 160,000 som/year, Nursing - 140,000 som/year. Prices may change each year.
payment.discounts: Discounts available: 15% for honors students (GPA 4.5+), 10% for full-year payment, 5% for large families, benefits for socially vulnerable categories.
payment.installment: Yes, payment by semester (50% by Sept 1, 50% by Feb 1) or monthly installments (September‚ÄìJune) is possible. Additional fee for installments - 5%.
payment.methods: Payments accepted by bank transfer, online banking (Elsom, Balance.kg, MBank), cash at the university cashier, payment terminals, bank cards.
payment.included: Tuition includes lectures, practical classes, library access, laboratory work, campus internet. Textbooks, hostel and meals are paid separately.

hostel.availability: Yes, the university provides a modern hostel for 200 places. Allocation is by application queue. Priority goes to non-local students and orphans.
hostel.cost: Hostel fee is 3000 som per month per bed in a 2-3 bed room. The price includes utilities, internet and cleaning of common areas.
hostel.conditions: Hostel is equipped with furniture, refrigerators, washing machines, kitchens on each floor, study rooms, Wi-Fi, CCTV and 24/7 security.
hostel.application: Application is submitted together with admission documents. A completed form, family income certificates, medical certificate and registration documents are required.

insurance.title: Medical insurance
insurance.content: Mandatory medical insurance for the entire period of study. Cost: approx. 5000 som/year. Covers basic medical services.

general.admissionStart: Document submission at Salymbekov University starts on July 1 and continues until August 15 each year. Documents can be submitted in person at the admission office or online through our website.
general.programs: Salymbekov University offers programs in: General Medicine, Dentistry, Pharmacy, Nursing. All programs are accredited by the Ministry of Education and Science of the Kyrgyz Republic.
general.duration: Study duration depends on the program: General Medicine - 6 years, Dentistry and Pharmacy - 5 years, Nursing - 4 years.
general.languages: Teaching is conducted in Russian and Kyrgyz languages. Students can choose their preferred language of instruction upon admission.
general.internship: Yes, the university cooperates with leading medical centers in Germany, Turkey and other countries. The best students can do internships abroad.
general.diplomaRecognition: Salymbekov University diploma is recognized in CIS countries. For work in other countries, additional certification according to local legislation may be required.
general.exchangePrograms: Yes, the university participates in academic mobility programs with partner universities in Russia, Kazakhstan, Turkey and other countries.
general.militaryDeferment: Yes, full-time students receive deferment from military service for the entire study period according to the legislation of the Kyrgyz Republic.

documents.required: Required documents: high school diploma, passport, medical certificate form 086U, ORT certificate, photos 3x4 (6 pcs), family composition certificate, income certificate (for benefits).
documents.nostrification: Yes, education documents obtained outside the Kyrgyz Republic are subject to mandatory nostrification in relevant state authorities.
documents.medicalValidity: Medical certificate form 086U is valid for 6 months from the date of issue. The certificate must contain all necessary medical examinations.
documents.onlineSubmission: Yes, you can apply online through our website. After application approval, you will need to provide original documents within 3 days.
documents.translation: Documents in Russian language do not require translation. Documents in other languages must be translated into Kyrgyz or Russian and notarized.
documents.lostDocuments: If documents are lost, they must be restored in the relevant authorities. For diploma contact your school, for passport - Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Kyrgyz Republic. The procedure may take up to 30 days.

exams.subjects: For medical specialties (General Medicine, Dentistry): biology and chemistry. For Pharmacy: chemistry and biology. For Nursing: only biology. ORT certificate is also required.
exams.dates: Entrance exams are held from August 20 to 25. The exact schedule is published on the university website and in the admission office by August 15.
exams.minimumScore: Minimum ORT scores: General Medicine - 120, Dentistry - 110, Pharmacy - 100, Nursing - 90 points. For profile subjects - minimum 60% correct answers.
exams.retake: Retaking entrance exams is possible only in the next academic year. Only one attempt is given in the current year.
exams.preparation: The university conducts preparatory courses from May to July. Also recommend using textbooks for grades 10-11 in biology and chemistry, ORT tests from previous years.
exams.format: Exams are conducted in test form. Each test contains 40 questions, time limit - 90 minutes. Forms for computer processing of results are used.
exams.benefits: Benefits are provided to orphans, disabled people of groups I-II, combat veterans. Winners of republican olympiads are enrolled without exams.

payment.cost: Tuition fees: General Medicine - 180,000 KGS/year, Dentistry - 200,000 KGS/year, Pharmacy - 160,000 KGS/year, Nursing - 140,000 KGS/year. Prices may change annually.
payment.discounts: Yes, discounts are provided: 15% for excellent students (GPA 4.5+), 10% for full year payment, 5% for large families, benefits for socially vulnerable categories.
payment.installment: Yes, payment by semesters is possible (50% by September 1, 50% by February 1) or monthly (10 equal payments from September to June). Additional fee for installment - 5%.
payment.methods: Payment is possible by: bank transfer, online banking (Elsom, Balance.kg, MBank), cash at university cash desk, through payment terminals, bank card.
payment.included: The fee includes: lectures, practical classes, access to library, laboratory work, internet on campus. Additional payment for: textbooks, dormitory, meals.

hostel.availability: Yes, the university provides a modern dormitory for 200 places. Placement is by application in order of priority. Priority is given to non-resident students and orphans.
hostel.cost: The cost of accommodation is 3000 KGS per month per place in a room for 2-3 people. The price includes: utilities, internet, cleaning of common areas.
hostel.conditions: The dormitory is equipped with: furniture, refrigerators, washing machines, kitchens on each floor, study rooms, Wi-Fi, video surveillance system, 24/7 security.
hostel.application: The application is submitted simultaneously with admission documents. You need to fill out a questionnaire, provide family income certificates, medical certificate, registration documents.
